title: Best of The Herd: 02/15/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 02/15/2019
description:
Colin says that people around the NBA aren't upset by tampering, they're upset that its the Lakers tampering.  He kinds a way to defend Matt Kuchar for barely tipping hid caddy.  Plus, LA Times Writer Bill Plaschke talks about how LeBron James has not fully bought in to being a Laker
